price: Talaga ngang nagsugo Kami kay Moises kalakip ng mga tanda Namin at isang katunayang malinaw
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā mūsā biāyātinā wasul'ṭānin mubīnin
